metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17453 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Bento4 1.5.1.0 has a NULL pointer dereference in AP4_DescriptorListWriter::Action in Core/Ap4Descriptor.h, related to AP4_IodsAtom::WriteFields in Core/Ap4IodsAtom.cpp, as demonstrated by mp4encrypt or mp4compact.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
